# Robust Methods for Robust Small Area Estimation

```{r results='asis', echo=FALSE}
cat(packageDescription("saeRobust", fields = "Description"))
```


# Installation

From CRAN:

```{r eval=FALSE}
installed.packages("saeRobust")
```

From this repo:

```{r eval=FALSE}
devtools::install_github("wahani/saeRobust")
```
